mapper.select: select uaSeq, user_uSeq, uaCateCd, uaName, uaBOD, uaGenderCd, uaBreed, uaRegNo, uaRegDate, uaMofDate, uaDelNy FROM uAnimal WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO uAnimal ( uaCateCd, uaName, uaBOD, uaGenderCd, uaBreed, uaRegNo, uaRegDate ) VALUE ( #{uaCateCd}, #{uaName}, #{uaBOD}, #{uaGenderCd}, #{uaBreed}, #{uaRegNo}, now(), )
